result.eng: O God, why did you abandon me?

result.orig: Abair leis fanacht liom

result.eng: No need to thank me, my friend.

result.eng: There is no energy in me anymore.

result.eng: You don't have to pay me the twenty pounds back.

result.html: Níl ort an fiche punt sin a íoc ar ais liomYou don't have to pay me the twenty pounds back.
result.ponchtml: Níl ort an fiċe punt sin a íoc ar ais liomYou don't have to pay me the twenty pounds back.

result.eng: You are not as pretty as me.
result.ga: Níl tú chomh hálainn liomsa

result.html: Níl tú chomh hálainn liomsaYou are not as pretty as me.
result.ponchtml: Níl tú ċoṁ hálainn liomsaYou are not as pretty as me.

result.eng: Set me free!
result.ga: Scaoil saor mé
result.orig: Scaoil saor mé
result.html: Scaoil saor méSet me free!
result.ponchtml: Scaoil saor méSet me free!

result.eng: She stood before me in the queue.
result.ga: Sheas sí romham sa scuaine

result.ponchtml: Ṡeas sí roṁam sa scuaineShe stood before me in the queue.

result.eng: She walked after me.

result.html: Shiúil sí i mo dhiaidhShe walked after me.
result.ponchtml: Ṡiúil sí i mo ḋiaiḋShe walked after me.

result.eng: The meeting sucked all my energy out of me.

result.eng: Visit me when you're in the country.

result.eng: Give me the book please.

result.html: Tabhair dom an leabhar le do thoilGive me the book please.
result.ponchtml: Taḃair dom an leaḃar le do ṫoilGive me the book please.

result.eng: They offred me help.

result.eng: She showed me her bedroom.

result.eng: The book gave me food for thought.

result.ponchtml: Ṫug an leaḃar áḃar maċnaiṁ domThe book gave me food for thought.

result.eng: Somebody gave it to me.
result.ga: Thug duine éigin dom é
result.orig: Thug duine éigin dom é
result.html: Thug duine éigin dom éSomebody gave it to me.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug duine éigin dom éSomebody gave it to me.

result.eng: They made me an offer I couldn't refuse.

result.eng: He gave me a promise that he would come back.

result.html: Thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar aisHe gave me a promise that he would come back.

result.eng: It took me half a year to write the book.

result.html: Thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobhIt took me half a year to write the book.

result.eng: The horse has left me.
result.ga: Tá an capall imithe uaim
result.orig: Tá an capall imithe uaim
result.html: Tá an capall imithe uaimThe horse has left me.
result.ponchtml: Tá an capall imiṫe uaimThe horse has left me.

result.eng: This problem is tormenting me.
result.ga: Tá an fhadhb seo do mo chrá
result.orig: Tá an fhadhb seo do mo chrá
result.html: Tá an fhadhb seo do mo chráThis problem is tormenting me.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ḟaḋb seo do mo ċráThis problem is tormenting me.

result.eng: I am afraid, you won't leave me?
result.ga: Tá eagla orm ní imeoidh tú uaim
result.orig: Tá eagla orm ní imeoidh tú uaim
result.html: Tá eagla orm ní imeoidh tú uaimI am afraid, you won't leave me?
result.ponchtml: Tá eagla orm ní imeoiḋ tú uaimI am afraid, you won't leave me?

result.eng: I am much indebted to you for the support you've given me.
result.ga: Tá mé go mór faoi chomaoin agat as an tacaíocht a thug tú dom
result.orig: Tá mé go mór faoi chomaoin agat as an tacaíocht a thug tú dom

result.eng: There is strength and energy in me.
result.ga: Tá neart agus fuinneamh ionam
result.orig: Tá neart agus fuinneamh ionam
result.html: Tá neart agus fuinneamh ionamThere is strength and energy in me.
result.ponchtml: Tá neart agus fuinneaṁ ionamThere is strength and energy in me.

result.eng: It is time for me to leave.
result.ga: Tá sé in am dom imeacht
result.orig: Tá sé in am dom imeacht
result.html: Tá sé in am dom imeachtIt is time for me to leave.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé in am dom imeaċtIt is time for me to leave.

result.eng: You are three years older than me.
result.ga: Tá trí bliana agat orm
result.orig: Tá trí bliana agat orm
result.html: Tá trí bliana agat ormYou are three years older than me.
result.ponchtml: Tá trí bliana agat ormYou are three years older than me.

result.eng: It's Máire (literally, "Máire is on me").
result.ga: Máire atá ormsa
result.orig: Máire atá ormsa
result.html: Máire atá ormsaIt's Máire (literally, "Máire is on me").
result.ponchtml: Máire atá ormsaIt's Máire (literally, "Máire is on me").

result.eng: I will see what is happening there, excuse me.

result.orig: Feicfidh mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gabh mo leithscéal

result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gaḃ mo leiṫscéalI will see what is happening there, excuse me.

result.eng: The lecturer is becoming unhappy with me.

result.ponchtml: Tá an léaċtóir ag éirí míẛásta liomThe lecturer is becoming unhappy with me.

result.eng: Excuse me. Can you say that again, please?

result.orig: Gabh mo leithscéal An féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do thoil

result.ponchtml: Gaḃ mo leiṫscéal An féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do ṫoilExcuse me. Can you say that again, please?

result.eng: She gave me a prescription and I got the medicine in the pharmacy but the medicine makes me tired.

result.eng: My friend Deirdre was with me.

result.ponchtml: Ḃí mo ċara Deirdre liomMy friend Deirdre was with me.

result.eng: Give me a glass of orange juice, Mommy.

result.eng: Would you like to see a movie with me?

result.eng: Tell me about the village. Are there good amenities there?

result.eng: [Looking at a family photo:] Let me see - six boys and four girls. Am I right?

result.eng: She is three years older than me.

result.eng: Me too!

result.orig: Mise chomh maith

result.eng: Would you like to come to dinner with me tonight?

result.html: Ar mhaith leat teacht le haghaidh dinnéir liomWould you like to come to dinner with me tonight?

result.eng: Would you like to go a concert with me on Saturday?

result.orig: Ar mhaith leat dul chuig ceolchoirm liom Dé Sathairn

result.eng: Tell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.

result.eng: Can you hear me now?
result.ga: An gcloiseann tú anois mé

result.html: An gcloiseann tú anois méCan you hear me now?
result.ponchtml: An gcloiseann tú anois méCan you hear me now?

result.eng: Excuse me. What time is it?
result.ga: Gabh mo leithscéal Cén t-am atá sé
result.orig: Gabh mo leithscéal Cén t-am atá sé
result.html: Gabh mo leithscéal Cén t-am atá séExcuse me. What time is it?
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ mo leiṫscéal Cén t-am atá séExcuse me. What time is it?

result.eng: It hurt me that my mother should be begging.
result.ga: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirce
result.orig: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirce
result.html: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirceIt hurt me that my mother should be begging.
result.ponchtml: Ġoin sé mé go mbeaḋ mo ṁáṫair ag lorg déirceIt hurt me that my mother should be begging.

result.eng: He looked at me with a sad expression.
result.ga: D'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach air
result.orig: D'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach air
result.html: D'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach airHe looked at me with a sad expression.
result.ponchtml: D'aṁarc sé orm agus dreaċ brónaċ airHe looked at me with a sad expression.

result.eng: The whole thing is making me afraid.
result.ga: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla orm
result.orig: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla orm
result.html: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla ormThe whole thing is making me afraid.
result.ponchtml: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla ormThe whole thing is making me afraid.

result.eng: It scares me to my skin.
result.ga: Cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn orm
result.orig: Cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn orm
result.html: Cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn ormIt scares me to my skin.
result.ponchtml: Cuireann sé eagla mo ċraicinn ormIt scares me to my skin.

result.eng: She disliked me immediately.
result.ga: Bhí col aici láithreach liom

result.html: Bhí col aici láithreach liomShe disliked me immediately.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí col aici láiṫreaċ liomShe disliked me immediately.

result.eng: I will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.orig: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.html: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadhI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfaiḋ mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósaḋI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!

result.eng: It was bad of me not to give you advice.
result.ga: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.orig: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.html: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibhIt was bad of me not to give you advice.

result.eng: It was foolish of me to ask that question.
result.ga: B'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a chur
result.orig: B'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a chur
result.html: B'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a churIt was foolish of me to ask that question.
result.ponchtml: B'amaideaċ an ṁaise domsa an ċeist a ċurIt was foolish of me to ask that question.

result.eng: One of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.

result.eng: We are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.
result.ga: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nasctha tusa agus mise
result.orig: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nasctha tusa agus mise
result.html: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nasctha tusa agus miseWe are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.
result.ponchtml: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nascṫa tusa agus miseWe are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.

result.eng: Who are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]
result.ga: Cé tusa domsa
result.orig: Cé tusa domsa
result.html: Cé tusa domsaWho are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]
result.ponchtml: Cé tusa domsaWho are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]

result.eng: The reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.
result.ga: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsanta

result.eng: They only live a couple of miles away from me.
result.ga: Níl siad ina gcónaí ach cúpla míle uaimse
result.orig: Níl siad ina gcónaí ach cúpla míle uaimse
result.html: Níl siad ina gcónaí ach cúpla míle uaimseThey only live a couple of miles away from me.
result.ponchtml: Níl siad ina gcónaí aċ cúpla míle uaimseThey only live a couple of miles away from me.

result.eng: It was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.
result.ga: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire í
result.orig: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire í
result.html: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire íIt was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ iontas ar biṫ dom gur spiaire íIt was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.

result.eng: He left a letter for me at the reception desk.
result.ga: D'fhág sé litir dom ag an deasc fáilte
result.orig: D'fhág sé litir dom ag an deasc fáilte
result.html: D'fhág sé litir dom ag an deasc fáilteHe left a letter for me at the reception desk.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág sé litir dom ag an deasc fáilteHe left a letter for me at the reception desk.

result.eng: The images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ga: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.orig: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.html: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain na híoṁánna bíogaḋ asam lena gcuid áilleaċta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.

result.eng: I was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romham
result.orig: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romham
result.html: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romhamI was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag réitiú do mo ḃainis naċ raiḃ aċ aon lá déag roṁamI was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.

result.eng: While I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ga: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
result.orig: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
result.html: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime domWhile I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ponchtml: Agus mé ag breaṫnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo ḃí rud aṁáin ag déanaṁ scime domWhile I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...

result.eng: There'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ga: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.orig: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.html: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeaḋ gar doṁsa nó duitse a ḃeiṫ ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.

result.eng: That's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ga: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.orig: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.html: Sin an rud a thug an bealach méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ponchtml: Sin an rud a ṫug an bealaċ méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.

result.eng: She'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ga: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.orig: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.html: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ponchtml: B'ḟada i dteaċ na mboċt nó ag cruinniú na déirce í aċ go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!

result.eng: Why did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?
result.ga: Cad chuige a raibh tú domh
result.orig: Cad chuige a raibh tú domh
result.html: Cad chuige a raibh tú domhWhy did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?
result.ponchtml: Cad ċuige a raiḃ tú doṁWhy did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?

result.eng: There's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ga: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.orig: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.html: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ponchtml: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a ḋéanaṁ díom nuair a ḃeas mé ar ẛiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?

result.eng: Follow me. Do as I do.
result.ga: Lean domhsa
result.orig: Lean domhsa
result.html: Lean domhsaFollow me. Do as I do.
result.ponchtml: Lean doṁsaFollow me. Do as I do.

result.eng: They gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ga: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.orig: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.html: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad scoil agus léann doṁ ar feaḋ a n-acṁainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.

result.eng: Nothing could scare me.
result.ga: Ní raibh eagla le cur orm
result.orig: Ní raibh eagla le cur orm
result.html: Ní raibh eagla le cur ormNothing could scare me.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ eagla le cur ormNothing could scare me.

result.eng: You think it's strange for me to talk like that.
result.ga: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidse
result.orig: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidse
result.html: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidseYou think it's strange for me to talk like that.
result.ponchtml: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a ḃeiṫ iontaċ ag mo leiṫéidseYou think it's strange for me to talk like that.

result.eng: They took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ga: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.orig: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.html: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ponchtml: Ṫóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roiṁ an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
